title: Banhzy
author: Banhzy
content: Hi all, Anyone know how to access an old ETH wallet with a phrase that contains words not in the BIP39 wordlist? I assume the wallet was made with MIST years ago. Unsure if it has anything in it but worth checking. I am unable to access it and get an invalid error when trying to access it with MEW. Any help much appreciated.Cheers

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: Did you already follow these step? https://wolovim.medium.com/mist-migration-patterns-6bcf066ac383There has been some migration for (Mist), feel free to try first from their article, and I hope you successfully access your wallet again due (Mist) is being shutdown by them. I think their team-member still answering on Github.Can maybe trying to ask with them too.
